data.title: ACEP Scientific Assembly
data.meta_description: ACEP24 returns to one of your favorite locations – Las Vegas, September 29 – October 2. Come and surround yourself with those who know you best, absorb practice changing education and relentlessly pursue excellence. Stack the deck in your favor. Bet on your future. Bet on yourself. Registration is Open Now!
data.text:
Register Now for ACEP24 –

the Safest Bet You Can Make

Attend the world’s largest emergency medicine conference to connect with friends, learn new skills & engage in meaningful discussions about the specialty.

September 29 – October 2, 2024 | Las Vegas, NV

Register Today Book Hotel

Explore What’s New For You at ACEP24

Based on your feedback, ACEP24 offers more flexibility in your days, additional ways to interact with your peers & dynamic new learning options.

See What to Expect
